trans-unit.source: First strike
trans-unit.target: 先攻

trans-unit.resname: LTC·1 | Éowyn, Shieldmaiden | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if another Human entered the battlefield under your control this turn, create two 2/2 red Human Knight creature tokens with trample and haste. Then if you control six or more Humans, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，若本回合中有另一个人类在你的操控下进战场，则派出两个2/2红色，具践踏与敏捷异能的人类／骑士衍生生物。然后如果你操控六个或更多人类，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·2 | Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit
trans-unit.target: 雄心霍比特人弗罗多

trans-unit.resname: LTC·2 | Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Partner with Sam, Loyal Attendant
trans-unit.target: 与忠诚随员山姆拍档

trans-unit.resname: LTC·2 | Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: LTC·2 | Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Frodo, Adventurous Hobbit attacks, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, the Ring tempts you. Then if Frodo is your Ring-bearer and the Ring has tempted you two or more times this game, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当雄心霍比特人弗罗多攻击时，若你本回合中获得过3点或更多生命，则魔戒引诱你。然后如果弗罗多是你的持戒人，且本盘游戏中魔戒已引诱你两次或更多，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·3 | Galadriel, Elven-Queen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Galadriel, Elven-Queen
trans-unit.target: 精灵女王加拉德瑞尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·3 | Galadriel, Elven-Queen | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if another Elf entered the battlefield under your control this turn, starting with you, each player votes for dominion or guidance. If dominion gets more votes, the Ring tempts you, then you put a +1/+1 counter on your Ring-bearer. If guidance gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 议定～在你回合的战斗开始时，若本回合中有另一个妖精在你的操控下进战场，则由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「占有」或「指引」。若占有票数较多，则魔戒引诱你，然后你在你的持戒人上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若指引票数较多或两者同为最多，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 魔戒之主索隆

trans-unit.resname: LTC·4 | Sauron, Lord of the Rings | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 当你施放此咒语时，囤兵半兽人5，磨五张牌，然后将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·4 | Sauron, Lord of the Rings | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a commander an opponent controls dies, the Ring tempts you.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的指挥官死去时，魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·5 | Aragorn, King of Gondor | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.source: "In this place will I abide, and my heirs, unto the ending of the world."
trans-unit.target: 「我将永居此处，传承后嗣，直至世界终结。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·6 | Gandalf, Westward Voyager | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, each opponent reveals the top card of their library. If any of those cards shares a card type with that spell, copy that spell, you may choose new targets for the copy, and each opponent draws a card. Otherwise, you draw a card. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放法术力值等于或大于5的咒语时，每位对手各展示其牌库顶牌。若其中任一牌与该咒语具共通的牌张类别，则复制该咒语，你可以为复制品选择新的目标，且每位对手各抓一张牌。若否，则你抓一张牌。（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.source: When Monstrosity of the Lake enters the battlefield, you may pay {5}. If you do, tap all creatures your opponents control, then put a stun counter on each of those creatures. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 当湖中怪兽进战场时，你可以支付{5}。若你如此作，则横置所有由对手操控的生物，然后在这些生物上各放置一个晕眩指示物。（如果某个其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTC·22 | Monstrosity of the Lake | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
trans-unit.target: 循环海岛{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张海岛牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.target: 召起围栏

trans-unit.resname: LTC·23 | Raise the Palisade | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Choose a creature type. Return all creatures that aren't of the chosen type to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 选择一种生物类别。将所有不为该类别的生物移回各自拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·23 | Raise the Palisade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She seemed tall beyond measurement, and beautiful beyond enduring, terrible and worshipful.
trans-unit.target: 她显得高不可测、美不可攀，恐怖与尊贵并存。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·24 | Subjugate the Hobbits | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Subjugate the Hobbits
trans-unit.target: 征服霍比特人

trans-unit.resname: LTC·24 | Subjugate the Hobbits | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Gain control of each noncommander creature with mana value 3 or less.
trans-unit.target: 获得所有法术力值小于或等于3且非指挥官之生物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·24 | Subjugate the Hobbits | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This is worse than Mordor! Much worse, in a way. It comes home to you, as they say, because it is a home, and you remember it before it was all ruined."\n—Sam
trans-unit.target: 「这比魔多还要糟糕！从某方面来说，甚至是糟糕透了。用他们的话来说，就是糟糕到了家～因为这里真的是你家，而且你还记得它以前的样子，但现在全毁了。」 ～山姆

trans-unit.resname: LTC·25 | Trap the Trespassers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Trap the Trespassers
trans-unit.target: 围困擅闯客

trans-unit.resname: LTC·25 | Trap the Trespassers | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Secret council — Each player secretly votes for a creature you don't control, then those votes are revealed. For each creature with one or more votes, put that many stun counters on it, then tap it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 密议～每位牌手各私下投票选择一个不由你操控的生物，然后展示投票结果。对每个得到一票或数票的生物而言，在其上放置等量的晕眩指示物，然后将它横置。（如果某个其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTC·26 | Gollum, Obsessed Stalker | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，每位本盘游戏中受过名称为痴迷跟踪怪咕噜之生物战斗伤害的对手均失去若干生命，其数量等同于你本回合中获得过的生命数量。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·43 | Prize Pig | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The habit of building farmhouses and barns began among the inhabitants of the Marish down by the Brandywine.
trans-unit.target: 建造农舍和谷仓的习惯，是从白兰地河边上的泽地居民传开的。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·44 | Travel Through Caradhras | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Travel Through Caradhras
trans-unit.target: 穿越卡拉兹拉斯

trans-unit.resname: LTC·44 | Travel Through Caradhras | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Council's dilemma — Starting with you, each player votes for Redhorn Pass or Mines of Moria. For each Redhorn Pass vote, search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you search your library this way, shuffle. For each Mines of Moria vote, return a card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 议争～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「红角口」或「墨瑞亚矿坑」。「红角口」每有一票，便从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置放进战场。如果你以此法搜寻你的牌库，则洗牌。「墨瑞亚矿坑」每有一票，便将一张牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·44 | Travel Through Caradhras | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Exile Travel Through Caradhras.
trans-unit.target: 放逐穿越卡拉兹拉斯。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·45 | Windswift Slice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Windswift Slice
trans-unit.target: 迅风割斩

trans-unit.resname: LTC·45 | Windswift Slice | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. Create a number of 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens equal to the amount of excess damage dealt this way.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。派出若干1/1绿色妖精／战士衍生生物，其数量等同于以此法造成的过量伤害数量。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·45 | Windswift Slice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A shrill yell went up—they had been seen. There was a ring and clash of steel.
trans-unit.target: 尖叫声起～追兵发现了他们。顿时钢铁出鞘相撞的声音响成一片。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·46 | The Balrog of Moria | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Balrog of Moria
trans-unit.target: 墨瑞亚炎魔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·46 | The Balrog of Moria | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample, haste
trans-unit.target: 践踏，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: LTC·46 | The Balrog of Moria | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When The Balrog of Moria dies, you may exile it. When you do, for each opponent, exile up to one target creature that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 当墨瑞亚炎魔死去时，你可以将它放逐。当你如此作时，为每位对手各进行以下流程～放逐至多一个目标由该牌手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·46 | The Balrog of Moria | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Cycling {3}{R} ({3}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 循环{3}{R}（{3}{R}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: LTC·46 | The Balrog of Moria | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: When you cycle The Balrog of Moria, create two Treasure tokens.
trans-unit.target: 当你循环墨瑞亚炎魔时，派出两个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·47 | Banquet Guests | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Banquet Guests
trans-unit.target: 宴会客人

trans-unit.resname: LTC·47 | Banquet Guests | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Affinity for Food (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Food you control.)
trans-unit.target: 食品共鸣（你每操控一个食品，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。）

trans-unit.resname: LTC·47 | Banquet Guests | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: LTC·47 | Banquet Guests | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Banquet Guests enters the battlefield with twice X +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 宴会客人进战场时上面有两倍于X数量的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·47 | Banquet Guests | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: {2}, Sacrifice a Food: Banquet Guests gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {2}，牺牲一个食品：宴会客人获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·48 | Bilbo, Birthday Celebrant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bilbo, Birthday Celebrant
trans-unit.target: 生日寿星比尔博

trans-unit.resname: LTC·48 | Bilbo, Birthday Celebrant | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将获得生命，则改为你获得原数量加1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·48 | Bilbo, Birthday Celebrant | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{W}{B}{G}, {T}, Exile Bilbo, Birthday Celebrant: Search your library for any number of creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only if you have 111 or more life.
trans-unit.target: {2}{W}{B}{G}，{T}，放逐生日寿星比尔博：从你的牌库中搜寻任意数量的生物牌，将它们放进战场，然后洗牌。只能于你的总生命为111或更多时起动。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·49 | Boromir, Gondor's Hope | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boromir, Gondor's Hope
trans-unit.target: 刚铎之望波洛米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·49 | Boromir, Gondor's Hope | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Boromir, Gondor's Hope enters the battlefield or attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a Human or artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当刚铎之望波洛米尔进战场或攻击时，检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以展示其中一张人类或神器牌并置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·49 | Boromir, Gondor's Hope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Long have I wandered by roads forgotten, seeking the house of Elrond."
trans-unit.target: 「我已在遭弃道路上徘徊良久，一路寻找埃尔隆德之家所在。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·50 | Círdan the Shipwright | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Círdan the Shipwright
trans-unit.target: 造船者奇尔丹

trans-unit.resname: LTC·50 | Círdan the Shipwright | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: LTC·50 | Círdan the Shipwright | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Secret council — Whenever Círdan the Shipwright enters the battlefield or attacks, each player secretly votes for a player, then those votes are revealed. Each player draws a card for each vote they received. Each player who received no votes may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 密议～每当造船者奇尔丹进战场或攻击时，每位牌手各私下投票选择一位牌手，然后展示投票结果。对每位牌手而言，其每得一票，便抓一张牌。对每位未得票的牌手而言，其可以将一张永久物牌从其手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·51 | Elrond of the White Council | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elrond of the White Council
trans-unit.target: 白道会的埃尔隆德

trans-unit.resname: LTC·51 | Elrond of the White Council | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Secret council — When Elrond of the White Council enters the battlefield, each player secretly votes for fellowship or aid, then those votes are revealed. For each fellowship vote, the voter chooses a creature they control. You gain control of each creature chosen this way, and they gain "This creature can't attack its owner." Then for each aid vote, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 密议～当白道会的埃尔隆德进战场时，每位牌手各私下投票选择「组盟」或「援助」，然后展示投票结果。对每票「组盟」而言，投该票者选择一个由其操控的生物。你获得所有以此法选中之生物的操控权，且这些生物获得「此生物不能攻击其拥有者。」然后「援助」每有一票，便在每个由你操控的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·52 | Éomer, King of Rohan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Éomer, King of Rohan
trans-unit.target: 洛汗国王伊奥梅尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·52 | Éomer, King of Rohan | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Double strike
trans-unit.target: 连击

trans-unit.resname: LTC·52 | Éomer, King of Rohan | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Éomer, King of Rohan enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Human you control.
trans-unit.target: 洛汗国王伊奥梅尔进战场时上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于由你操控之其他人类的数量。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·52 | Éomer, King of Rohan | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Éomer enters the battlefield, target player becomes the monarch. Éomer deals damage equal to its power to any target.
trans-unit.target: 当伊奥梅尔进战场时，目标牌手成为君主。伊奥梅尔对任意一个目标造成等同于前者力量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·53 | Erestor of the Council | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Erestor of the Council
trans-unit.target: 白道会的埃芮斯托

trans-unit.resname: LTC·53 | Erestor of the Council | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever players finish voting, each opponent who voted for a choice you voted for creates a Treasure token. You scry X, where X is the number of opponents who voted for a choice you didn't vote for. Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当所有牌手完成投票时，每位投票选择你投票之选项的对手各派出一个珍宝衍生物。你占卜X，X为投票选择你未投票之选项的对手数量。抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·53 | Erestor of the Council | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There are but two courses: to hide the Ring forever; or to unmake it."
trans-unit.target: 「这样就只剩下两条路了：要么将魔戒永远藏匿；要么就将它销毁。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·54 | Faramir, Steward of Gondor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faramir, Steward of Gondor
trans-unit.target: 刚铎宰相法拉米尔

trans-unit.resname: LTC·54 | Faramir, Steward of Gondor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a legendary creature with mana value 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个法术力值等于或大于4的传奇生物在你操控下进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·54 | Faramir, Steward of Gondor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, create two 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你是君主，则派出两个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·54 | Faramir, Steward of Gondor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The last Steward of Gondor begs leave to surrender his office."
trans-unit.target: 「刚铎最后一任宰相请求交还职权。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·55 | Farmer Cotton | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Farmer Cotton
trans-unit.target: 农夫科顿

trans-unit.resname: LTC·55 | Farmer Cotton | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Farmer Cotton enters the battlefield, create X 1/1 white Halfling creature tokens and X Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
trans-unit.target: 当农夫科顿进战场时，派出X个1/1白色半身人衍生生物和X个食品衍生物。（它们是具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: LTC·55 | Farmer Cotton | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "So it's begun at last! I've been itching for trouble all this year."
trans-unit.target: 「终于开始了！我这一整年总想着闹上一场。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·56 | Forth Eorlingas! | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forth Eorlingas!
trans-unit.target: 埃奥尔勇往直前！

trans-unit.resname: LTC·56 | Forth Eorlingas! | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create X 2/2 red Human Knight creature tokens with trample and haste.
trans-unit.target: 派出X个2/2红色，具践踏与敏捷异能的人类／骑士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·56 | Forth Eorlingas! | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to one or more players this turn, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，每当由你操控的一个或数个生物对一位或多位牌手造成战斗伤害时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·56 | Forth Eorlingas! | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A sword-day, a red day, ere the sun rises! Ride now, ride now! Ride to Gondor!"
trans-unit.target: 「举剑拼杀，浴血奋战，直至旭日重生！ 翻身策马，翻身策马！策马奔赴刚铎！」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·57 | Gríma, Saruman's Footman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gríma, Saruman's Footman
trans-unit.target: 萨茹曼听差格里马

trans-unit.resname: LTC·57 | Gríma, Saruman's Footman | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Gríma, Saruman's Footman can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 萨茹曼听差格里马不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·57 | Gríma, Saruman's Footman | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Gríma deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then that player puts the exiled cards that weren't cast this way on the bottom of their library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当格里马对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手从其牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张瞬间或法术牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。然后该牌手将所有以此法放逐且未施放的牌以随机顺序置于其牌库底。

trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。到IV后牺牲之。）

trans-unit.resname: LTC·58 | In the Darkness Bind Them | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: IV — 为每位对手各进行以下流程～获得至多一个目标由该牌手操控的生物之操控权直到回合结束。重置这些生物。它们获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。魔戒引诱你。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·59 | Lidless Gaze | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 放逐每位牌手的牌库顶牌。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以使用这些牌，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放。

trans-unit.target: 返照{2}{B}{R}（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: LTC·60 | Lord of the Nazgûl | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 3/3 black Wraith creature token with menace. Then if you control nine or more Wraiths, Wraiths you control have base power and toughness 9/9 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放瞬间或法术咒语时，派出一个3/3黑色，具威慑异能的鬼魂衍生生物。然后若你操控九个或更多鬼魂，则由你操控的鬼魂之基础力量与防御力为9/9直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·61 | Merry, Warden of Isengard | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 与艾森加德守门人皮平拍档（当此生物进战场时，目标牌手可以将皮平从其牌库置于其手上，然后洗牌。）

trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for return or embark. If return gets more votes, each player returns up to two cards from their graveyard to their hand, then you exile Sail into the West. If embark gets more votes or the vote is tied, each player may discard their hand and draw seven cards.
trans-unit.target: 议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「返乡」或「启程」。若返乡票数较多，则每位牌手各将至多两张牌从其坟墓场移回其手上，然后你放逐向西远航。若启程票数较多或两者同票，则每位牌手各可以弃掉其手牌并抓七张牌。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, each opponent reveals the top card of their library. If any of those cards shares a card type with that spell, copy that spell, you may choose new targets for the copy, and each opponent draws a card. Otherwise, you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放法术力值等于或大于5的咒语时，每位对手各展示其牌库顶牌。若其中任一牌与该咒语具共通的牌张类别，则复制该咒语，你可以为复制品选择新的目标，且每位对手各抓一张牌。若否，则你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Éomer, King of Rohan enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Human you control.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·136 | Erestor of the Council | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever players finish voting, each opponent who voted for a choice you voted for creates a Treasure token. You scry X, where X is the number of opponents who voted for a choice you didn't vote for. Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当所有牌手完成投票时，每位投票选择你投票之选项的对手各派出一个珍宝衍生物。你占卜X，X为投票选择你未投票之选项的对手数量。抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·136 | Erestor of the Council | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There are but two courses: to hide the Ring forever; or to unmake it."
trans-unit.target: 「这样就只剩下两条路了：要么将魔戒永远藏匿；要么就将它销毁。」

trans-unit.resname: LTC·354 | Sword of Hearth and Home | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐至多一个目标由你拥有的生物，然后从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌。将此两者在你的操控下放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·354 | Sword of Hearth and Home | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.source: "My heart rejoices; for you, Estel, shall be among the great whose valor will destroy the Shadow."\n—Arwen
trans-unit.target: 「而我心却欢欣鼓舞；因为你，埃斯泰尔，定将跻身凭勇气消灭魔影的伟人之列。」 ～阿尔玟

trans-unit.target: 「纳熙尔剑身已断、光芒消逝，至今不曾重铸。」 ～埃尔隆德

On the slab runes were deeply graven:
BALIN
SON OF FUNDIN
LORD OF MORIA

trans-unit.resname: LTC·363 | Deserted Temple | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Amon Sûl they called it. It was burned and broken, and nothing remains of it now but a tumbled ring, like a rough crown on the old hill's head.
trans-unit.target: 这地方他们称作阿蒙苏尔。原来的瞭望塔已遭烧毁坍塌，如今只一圈残迹，就像一顶戴在这座旧山头上的粗糙王冠。

trans-unit.target: 若你起手的手牌包含了阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞，且你不是先手牌手，则你可以让阿格拉隆德的晶辉洞在战场上来开始游戏，且上面有一个运气指示物。如果你如此作，则从你手上放逐一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·365 | Homeward Path | Flavor Text

"Let others a journey new begin,
But I at last with weary feet
Will turn towards the lighted inn,
My evening-rest and sleep to meet."
—Bilbo's song
trans-unit.target: 「任由他人踏新路， 疲惫如我自歇足。 明亮旅店寻道去， 暮休一觉美梦来。」 ～比尔博的歌

trans-unit.source: "I stand in the place of the Steward of Gondor, and it is mine to think first of its people. Gondor must be protected."\n—Prince Imrahil
trans-unit.target: 「眼下我暂代刚铎宰相之职，须以百姓为第一要务。必须守好刚铎。」 ～伊姆拉希尔亲王

trans-unit.source: The chief city of the Kings of Men was Osgiliath, Citadel of the Stars. Now it is deserted, and in its ruins shadows walk.
trans-unit.target: 原本「人中王者」设都于星辰城堡欧斯吉利亚斯。此处如今已遭废弃，空余邪影在残垣徘徊。

trans-unit.source: Beyond, in the great fief of Belfalas, dwelt Prince Imrahil in his castle of Dol Amroth by the sea.
trans-unit.target: 但是穿过那片地区之后，便是广阔封地贝尔法拉斯。伊姆拉希尔亲王就住在此处的海边城堡多阿姆洛斯里面。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·370 | Mouth of Ronom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We shall meet bitter cold, if not worse, before we come down on the other side. It will not help us to keep so secret that we are frozen to death."\n—Boromir

trans-unit.source: The Brandywine flowed slow and broad before them. A large flat ferry-boat was moored beside the landing.
trans-unit.target: 白兰地河横跨他们面前，河道宽广、流水潺潺。码头边就系着一艘平底大渡船。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·372 | Pillar of the Paruns | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source:
"The Road goes ever on and on,
Down from the door where it began.
Now far ahead the Road has gone,
And I must follow, if I can."
—Frodo's song
trans-unit.target: 「大路绵延遍天涯， 门外旅途始足下。 哪怕前道跨山水， 加快脚步紧跟随。」 ～弗罗多的歌

trans-unit.source: The keep was called the Hornburg, for a trumpet sounded upon the tower echoed in the Deep behind, as if armies long-forgotten were issuing to war from caves beneath the hills.
trans-unit.target: 此处被称为号角堡，因为只要有人在高塔上吹响号角，后方山谷便会回音震荡，仿佛有久遭遗忘的千军万马从山下洞穴冲出，杀向战场。

trans-unit.resname: LTC·375 | Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All dead, all rotten. Elves and Men and Orcs. There was a great battle here long ago, yes."\n—Gollum
trans-unit.target: 「全都死了，全都烂了。精灵、人类还有奥克。这里很久以前有过一场大战，是的。」 ～咕噜

trans-unit.resname: LTC·376 | Wasteland | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "But I am going to Mordor," said Frodo.\n"I know that well enough," said Sam. "Of course you are. And I'm coming with you."
trans-unit.target: 「可我要去的，是魔多。」弗罗多说。 「这我清楚得很，」山姆说。「你当然是要去魔多。而我要跟你一起去。」

trans-unit.source: Pippin thought he saw groves of trees moving. Could it be that the trees of Fangorn were awake, and the forest was rising, marching over the hills to war?

trans-unit.resname: LTC·518 | Hammerheim | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hammerheim
trans-unit.target: 榔头堡
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: LTC·518 | Hammerheim | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R}. {T}: Target creature loses all landwalk abilities until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·518 | Hammerheim | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In that golden hall dwells Théoden son of Thengel, King of the Mark of Rohan."\n—Gandalf

trans-unit.resname: LTC·519 | Urborg | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 乌尔博格

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {B}. {T}: Target creature loses first strike or swampwalk until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·519 | Urborg | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Not even an eagle poised against the sun would have marked the hobbits sitting there, under the weight of doom, silent, not moving, shrouded in their thin grey cloaks.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·520 | Soul's Attendant | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·520 | Soul's Attendant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Goldberry came before them, holding a candle. "Have peace now," she said, "until the morning! Heed no nightly noises! For nothing passes door and window here save moonlight and starlight and the wind off the hilltop."

trans-unit.resname: LTC·521 | Stonehewer Giant | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Vigilance {1}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Equipment card, put it onto the battlefield, attach it to a creature you control, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·521 | Stonehewer Giant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Indeed," said Glóin, "if it were not for the Beornings, the passage from Dale to Rivendell would long ago have become impossible. They are valiant Men."

trans-unit.resname: LTC·522 | Worship | Card Text
trans-unit.source: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·522 | Worship | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Éowyn Éomund's daughter, awake! For your enemy has passed away!"\n—Aragorn

trans-unit.resname: LTC·523 | Pact of Negation | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·523 | Pact of Negation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At that moment Gandalf lifted his staff, and crying aloud he smote the bridge before him.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·524 | River Kelpie | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever River Kelpie or another permanent enters the battlefield from a graveyard, draw a card. Whenever a player casts a spell from a graveyard, draw a card. Persist

trans-unit.resname: LTC·525 | Abyssal Persecutor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, trample You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·525 | Abyssal Persecutor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Come not between the Nazgûl and his prey! Or he will not slay thee in thy turn. He will bear thee away to the houses of lamentation, where thy flesh shall be devoured, and thy shriveled mind be left naked to the Lidless Eye."

trans-unit.resname: LTC·526 | Diabolic Intent | Card Text
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·526 | Diabolic Intent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Alas for Saruman! The palantir was his downfall, I now perceive. Perilous to us all are the devices of an art deeper than we possess ourselves."\n—Gandalf

trans-unit.resname: LTC·527 | Elvish Harbinger | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Elvish Harbinger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Elf card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·527 | Elvish Harbinger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Mirror of Galadriel shows things that were, and things that are, and things that yet may be."

trans-unit.resname: LTC·528 | Explore | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·528 | Explore | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Do not be afraid!" said Gandalf. "For you are not going like Frodo to Mordor, but to Minas Tirith, and there you will be as safe as you can be anywhere in these days."

trans-unit.resname: LTC·529 | Seasons Past | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return any number of cards with different mana values from your graveyard to your hand. Put Seasons Past on the bottom of its owner's library.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·529 | Seasons Past | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "How bright your garden looks!" said Gandalf. "Yes," said Bilbo. "I am very fond indeed of it, and of all the dear old Shire; but I think I need a holiday."

trans-unit.resname: LTC·530 | Second Harvest | Card Text
trans-unit.source: For each token you control, create a token that's a copy of that permanent.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·530 | Second Harvest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Each year at summer's end, I gather water lilies, green leaves and lilies white to please my pretty lady, the last ere the year's end to keep them from the winter, to flower by her pretty feet till the snows are melted."

trans-unit.resname: LTC·531 | Sylvan Tutor | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·531 | Sylvan Tutor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "That was a mighty show in the dark, my friend!" said Gimli.\n"But who can say what it hit?" said Legolas.

trans-unit.resname: LTC·532 | Tempt with Discovery | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Tempting offer — Search your library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield. Each opponent may search their library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield. For each opponent who searches a library this way, search your library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched a library this way shuffles.

trans-unit.source: "Never did I see an axe so wielded."\n—Aragorn
